Chrissy Teigen and John Legend have renewed their wedding vows PERIOD

The 37yearold model and John  returned to their wedding destination  Lake Como in Italy  to tie the knot in celebration of their tenth anniversary PERIOD

A source told PEOPLE 

The lovedup duo subsequently renewed their vows and spent some time with their guests PERIOD

The insider shared There was dancing and there was a lakeside bar that was a big favorite PERIOD The food was appreciated.flowers everywhereIts been a very elegant very classic event.all the timeIts probably obvious but she makes me laugh all the time PERIOD



By contrast John wasnt entirely sure what it is that Chrissy likes about him PERIOD

He said
